mapper.insert: insert into nation(alarm_lvl, continent_cd, continent_eng_nm, continent_nm, country_eng_nm, country_iso_alp2, country_nm, dang_map_download_url, flag_download_url, map_download_url, region_ty, remark, written_dt) VALUES(#{alarm_lvl}, #{continent_cd}, #{continent_eng_nm}, #{continent_nm}, #{country_eng_nm}, #{country_iso_alp2}, #{country_nm}, #{dang_map_download_url}, #{flag_download_url}, #{map_download_url}, #{region_ty}, #{remark}, #{written_dt})
